ModMetaData.name: Zombiefied (Zombie Apocalypse)
ModMetaData.author: Zombiefied
ModMetaData.description:
<size=22>Zombie Apocalypse</size> <size=17>A previously unknown desease, that causes the host to show unseen aggression and survivability, is spreading across the rim. Can you survive facing this new threat?</size>
This mod tries to be vanilla-ish. So (hopefully) no unintuitive new behaviour, no fancy zombie mutations. All the zombies behave just like other pawns in the game and are clickable etc.
<size=22>Zombies</size> -Human Zombies -Animal Zombies -Humanoid Alien Zombies -Modded Animal Zombies
For every living thing in your modded game a unique ZombiePawn is generated. When a living thing dies due to Zombies, it will reanimate as a Zombie that matches it's original appearance and stats.
<size=22>Features</size> -Zombie generation for any given Pawn -Zombies get attracted by noise -Zombies will attack any lifeform on sight
<size=22>Mod compatibility</size> -Compatible with most modded animals -Compatible with "Humanoid Alien Races 2.0" -Compatible with "Multiplayer"
<size=22>Latest Patch Notes</size> 2022.01.10: -Support 1.3
2021.06.17: Features: -Support 1.2 -Amount of noise on the map influences amount of zombieraids -Mechs dont attack zombies so they will be dangerous for the player regardless of zombie population
Bugfixes: -Problem where sometimes no pawns would spawn on gamestart is fixed -Melee attacks with guns no longer attract zombies
